title: Review and Fix Homepage Layout Issues

features.description: Header and Content have single border line (no duplicate)
steps: Verify only one 2px border line exists between header and content
Check in both light and dark mode

features.description: Footer and Content have single border line (no duplicate)
steps: Verify only one 2px border line exists between content and footer
Check in both light and dark mode

features.description: Footer column separators are single lines (no duplicate)
steps: Verify border-right on each column creates single vertical line
No doubled borders where columns meet
Verify logo, nav, and icons are vertically centered

features.description: Container padding is consistent across breakpoints
steps: Resize browser window through mobile, tablet, desktop sizes
Content should not touch screen edges on any size
Padding should increase proportionally on larger screens
Verify page content starts below fixed header
Scroll page and verify header stays fixed
Content should never be hidden behind header

features.description: Header three-column layout correct on desktop
steps: Verify Social icons on right side
All three sections should be visible

features.description: Header hamburger menu works on mobile
steps: Verify hamburger icon appears instead of nav/icons
Verify nav links and social icons appear in dropdown

features.description: Footer three-column layout correct on desktop
steps: Each section separated by vertical border
Verify columns stack or wrap appropriately
Borders should switch from vertical to horizontal
All content remains visible and readable

features.description: Navigation text uses uppercase with tracking

steps: Verify color changes from muted to foreground
Switch system to dark mode (or use prefers-color-scheme)
Verify borders use dark mode color
All elements remain visible and readable
